- Release year: 2008
- Runtime: 130min

It tells the story of Bella Swan, a teenager who moves to a new town and falls in love with Edward Cullen, a vampire with a secret. Their relationship is complicated by the fact that Edward and his family are "vegetarian" vampires, who only drink animal blood, and by the presence of other vampires who pose a threat to Bella.
